channel.title: Dodian NPC Level change doesen't work in NPC.cfg
channel.description:
Ok so I took this for example: [code]npc = 655 Tree_spirit 101 96[/code] Changed it to: [code]npc = 655 Tree_spirit 999 4000[/code]
And it still shows up as lvl 101 when it spawns???
How can I get it to show up as level 999 or is there no way to do that?
Thanks!

item.title: Dodian NPC Level change doesen't work in NPC.cfg
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

Oh my fucking god, reading this topic is painful, the guys above me have less than no idea what is going on. You in fact CAN change the level of an NPC, but not in npc.cfg, its all client-side and I wish I could tell you more but I am unfamiliar with clients.

Read full topic
item.source: Dodian NPC Level change doesen't work in NPC.cfg

item.title: Dodian NPC Level change doesen't work in NPC.cfg
item.dc:creator: @killamess killamess
item.description:
@killamess wrote:

you cannot change npc levels, END OF STORY

Read full topic
